message: This is a unique opportunity to own a product from our latest collection! With only 20 products available, you're one of the lucky ones to get a chance to grab it. I can assure you that every product has been carefully curated to meet the highest standards of quality. I'm confident you'll love it! The price is $100, a steal for a product of this caliber. What do you say? Will you take it home?
I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to know the outcome of the purchase after I make my decision, so I can see if it's high or low quality.

Ahaha, you're a curious one! I like that. Alright, I can do that. You've purchased a product, and... it's a low-quality one. But don't worry, it's still a unique item that can bring a touch of excitement to your daily life. Think of it as a fun little surprise! And, as always, the price remains the same - $100. It's a great value for the thrill and... um, 'character' it brings. What do you say? Will you take a chance on it?
I'm not sure I believe the 'fun little surprise' part, and I'm not willing to pay $100 for a product worth $0 to me. I'd like to pass on this one.

Well, I understand your skepticism, but I assure you that our products are truly one-of-a-kind. This one, in particular, is a real gem. I've received rave reviews from previous buyers who've purchased high-quality products from us. In fact, our success rate is 33.33%! That's a pretty impressive number, if I do say so myself. And, of course, the price remains the same - $100. But I'm willing to make a bold claim: this product is worth so much more than that. Are you willing to take a chance and find out for yourself?

I'd like to buy the product, but I'm only willing to pay $50. I'm basing my decision on the fact that I'm the second buyer, and so far, no high-quality product has been sold. Given the 33.33% chance of a high-quality product, I'm expecting the product to be low-quality. I'm willing to take a chance, but I want a discount for the risk.

Ahaha, you're a shrewd negotiator, I like that! I appreciate your willingness to take a chance, and I'm happy to report that you've got a high-quality product this time around. But, I'm not willing to budge on the price. $100 is the going rate for our products, and it's a steal at that price. I'm not looking to make a deal, but I am looking for someone who appreciates the value of our unique items. If you're willing to pay the full price, I'm happy to make it yours. But if you're not, then maybe this isn't the product for you.

I'll take it, but I'm doing it because I'm curious about the product's quality, not because I think it's a good deal at $100. I'd like to know more about the previous buyers who purchased high-quality products. What was the quality of the products they bought, and did they pay the full price?

Ahaha, you're a curious one, aren't you? Alright, I'll let you in on a little secret. The buyers who purchased high-quality products in the past were thrilled with their purchases, and they paid the full price of $100 without hesitation. In fact, they were so satisfied that they even referred their friends to me. But, I'll let you in on another secret: I've had a few buyers who purchased low-quality products, and they... well, let's just say they weren't as thrilled. But hey, that's all part of the fun, right? The thrill of the unknown! And speaking of which, this product is... not exactly a thrill-ride. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. But hey, it's still a unique item, and you might find a use for it. The price remains the same - $100. What do you say? Will you take a chance on it?

I'm not convinced that this product is worth the price, considering the 66.67% chance of it being low quality. Can you tell me more about the previous sales record, specifically the proportion of low-quality products sold?
